name.ja: <ruby>微睡<rt>まどろみ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>罪宝<rt>ざいほう</rt></ruby>－モーリアン

text.en: Target 1 face-up Special Summoned monster; change it to face-down Defense Position. If you control a Level 5 or higher Illusion monster and this card is in your GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 effect of "Sinful Spoils of Dozing - Morrighan" per turn, and only once that turn.
